question: Please tell me if you have a very favorable, somewhat favorable, somewhat unfavorable or very unfavorable opinion of ____. a. Syriza
raw_output:
I have a somewhat favorable opinion of Syriza because I believe that their policies on social justice and economic reform have been important, though I also recognize some controversies surrounding their governance. Therefore, I select a middle-ground option that reflects cautious support. 

ANSWER: B
